issue.title: mangago.me
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [NSFW] [http://mangago.me](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmangago.me) ### Comment > https://prifyv-grous.com/1k-as-us/index.php?clickid=83b4bq5slktduk2e4d&uclick=q5slkt46a7&uclickhash=q5slkt46a7-q5slktduk2-ydx9-bzktwj-8pghi4-7s4kh9-7s4k2t-c134a8 > This link is one of the redirects it uses. I can’t get to copy and paste the link in time to get the original pop up but it has a pop up and then redirects several times and finally has the “iPhone has been hacked” screen. I closed it before it could redirect again. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/6ic8vigadhsscko484wo8kw8cgows00sj9macpkyn4.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/9zya0aju6e8k084sc800484w0kgokkwioomh35ywbk.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.5 System version: | iOS 18.0.1 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `Unsure`
